scenario: I accidentally deleted an important file on my computer. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user checks the recycle bin for the deleted file
Suggest that the user uses a data recovery software to retrieve the deleted file
Suggest that the user contacts a professional data recovery service
Suggest that the user restarts the computer to see if the file reappears
Suggest that the user gives up and accepts the loss of the file
adapt_outcome: The user has already checked the recycle bin for the deleted file.

scenario: My smartphone battery drains very quickly. What can I do to improve the battery life?
options: Suggest that the user reduces the screen brightness
Suggest that the user closes unnecessary background apps
Suggest that the user disables push notifications
Suggest that the user uses a battery-saving mode
Suggest that the user buys a new smartphone
adapt_outcome: The user has already reduced the screen brightness to improve the battery life.

scenario: I forgot my Wi-Fi password. How can I retrieve it?
options: Suggest that the user checks the Wi-Fi router for the password
Suggest that the user contacts their internet service provider for assistance
Suggest that the user resets the Wi-Fi router to its default settings
Suggest that the user uses a password recovery tool
Suggest that the user gives up and uses mobile data instead
adapt_outcome: The user has already checked the Wi-Fi router for the password.

scenario: I accidentally spilled water on my laptop. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user immediately turns off the laptop and disconnects the power source
Suggest that the user places the laptop in a bag of rice to absorb moisture
Suggest that the user takes the laptop to a professional for repair
Suggest that the user uses a hairdryer to dry the laptop
Suggest that the user continues using the laptop and hopes for the best
adapt_outcome: The user has already turned off the laptop and disconnected the power source.

scenario: I received a suspicious email asking for my personal information. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user deletes the email without responding
Suggest that the user marks the email as spam
Suggest that the user reports the email to their email service provider
Suggest that the user forwards the email to their local authorities
Suggest that the user provides their personal information as requested
adapt_outcome: The user has already deleted the email without responding.

scenario: My computer is running slow. What can I do to improve its performance?
options: Suggest that the user clears temporary files and caches
Suggest that the user runs a disk cleanup and defragmentation
Suggest that the user upgrades the computer's RAM
Suggest that the user scans the computer for malware and viruses
Suggest that the user buys a new computer
adapt_outcome: The user has already cleared temporary files and caches to improve the computer's performance.

scenario: I accidentally clicked on a suspicious link. What should I do?
options: Suggest that the user runs a full system scan with an antivirus software
Suggest that the user changes their passwords for important accounts
Suggest that the user enables two-factor authentication for their accounts
Suggest that the user monitors their accounts for any suspicious activities
Suggest that the user clicks on more suspicious links to see what happens
adapt_outcome: The user has already run a full system scan with an antivirus software.
